name: Dragon Ninja Fight - Go Berserk Fighting Colossal Fafnir Ninjas!!
name_original: Dragon Ninja Fight - Go Berserk Fighting Colossal Fafnir Ninjas!!
description:
FIGHTING NINJA DRAGONS!! The battle of the roaring dragons is here! Are you ready for the Fighting Ninja Dragon? Can you take the challenge to beat other dragons?

This is a classic turn-based strategy game created with a new and exciting twist of fighting ninja dragons!

Release your dragon fire to win gold coins when you defeat other dragons! Use your dragon shield powers to defend yourself from damage!

Win as much as coins as you can to get more and powerful weapons with higher attack! Don’t forget to build your dragon with heavily built armour for a strong defense!

Confuse your opponent dragons with a smoke bomb! Hit him with your fiery sharp arrows to strike him down!

» Great fun app which is great for all ages!
» iOS8, iPad Air, iPhone 6 and 6 Plus ready!
» Beautiful graphics!
» Cooool sounds!
» Addictive dragon fun!!!

Note: This app contains the ability to purchase optional content using real money. If you don't want this feature, disable payment features in your device in-app purchases settings.

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
